CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Store pictures
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Store all pictures on external memory (sdcard) if enabled.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Skip Pictures
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Save to sdcard only every n pictures taken by the app. 1 = save every picture
Folder to store your webcam pictures in.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Other SD
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: For devices with the removable sdcard as a secondary sd enable this and specify the full storage path. Example: extSdCard/MobileWebCam/ for Galaxy Camera

EditTextPreference.android:title: Limit Pictures
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Specify the number of old pictures to keep (0 = all). Attention if you have other pictures in the sdcard directory specified! They will be deleted!
